transcript: I don't read many books at all I don't consume really much business content at all everything comes around like how do I solve this problem and then I just get really deep on trying to solve the problem I do a lot of interviews in terms of me reaching out to people who I think know the answer to my stuff especially if it's a new area because experts always have Consolidated information faster than anyone else has and so I just go straight to the people who've already read everything ask them what they think ask 10 of them see the comment rates and then I execute
